review: such a lovely story game
could not play for more than 15 minutes at a time because the camera movement makes my head hurt
fixed the mouse sensitivity issues
a bit short a bit easy but a beautiful art style and a good story   i had a good time with this game

i never would have thought that anyone could literally take a deep dive into lovecraft lore while also making a storydriven adventure about a lovestory this game is a very great experience if you are into storydriven puzzle games its a very wonderful journey  but also thalassophobia warning

best element by far art direction just what a gorgeously made game  second best world building not the plot itself but the world and main character within that world is really unique and excellent  third best solid puzzles each chapter has 12 main puzzles that really use the whole map instead of heres a room figure it out  had a great time excited to see what else they make

amazing game with a beautiful graphical style and a great cast of voice actors  the story is short but it has lots of interesting turns and kept me immersed right up until the very end  definitely recommend people to play this one
awesome

good game very nice narative well put together atmosphere i would love to see more of this developer in this style relaxed narrative heavy puzzlegame simple but engaging puzzles just what i need to wind down after work or during my commute on my steamdeck good for about 10 hours of gameplay calculate price per hour and see if its worth it for you

very beautiful game i didnt know what to play then this gem popped up the atmosphere is fenomenal and the puzzels arent nor too hard nor too easy the story is interesting and keeps the player hooked i reccomend it for those who are searching for a chill couch game session after work nice job
i was engrossed in this game from the beginning norah is such a great character and the mystery keeps you hooked until the end
short well made and bittersweet
im not crying thats just sea water in my eyes  its not particularly hard but it has a compelling plot the puzzles required some thought but not significantly hard
a charming little puzzle game set in the south pacific with a surprisingly good story and fantastic art direction short but sweet and well worth it
im not really into puzzle games but it was a beautiful story with an interesting twist on a certain fantasy author spoilerlovecraftspoiler

35  average  dear indie devs why do you make me move so slow you make me push the run button all the time and its still way too slow  anyways game was pretty mid but there was some good puzzles in there buy on discount
really nice game with a beautiful story its quite sad that in the most important part of the game it bugged so i didnt have much of a choice

this is more of a middle thumb  mechanically this is an okay puzzle games  technically its also pretty good  the game is pretty and the sound design is pretty excellent  the writing is awful though  its extremely heavy on exposition and the ending is such a massive letdown  imagine watching a movie for two and half hours and then the final 20 minutes are a literal slide show because they couldnt afford more than storyboarding  thats the ending to this game

i finished it  im left with a deep feeling pun intended that i cant quite place  im glad i was able to save before i made the final choice  i could barely stop playing i was so invested in the story and the puzzles were not hard but not easy  worth it at full price get this game if you love digging around and sad hopeful strange stories
holy nmolly this was amazing jesus christ

if youre thinking of playing it seriously just dive in without watching any trailers or reading up on it the less you know the better the experience the atmosphere is super chill and relaxing the puzzles are fun and just the right amount of tricky and the whole vibe is something special it made me go and read several short stories by a certain gentleman who had a questionably named cat

i have complicated feelings on this game i think they told a beautiful love story and had a mostly engaging selection of puzzles but there was also some frustration to be had there were a few points where i wished i was watching a cutscene rather than playing a game however none of the things i didnt like about the overall experience come anywhere close to preventing me from recommending the game especially to anyone who appreciates a very well written love story
movement should be improved but graphics and puzzles is super nice
i liked the story puzzles are good not too easy not too hard gorgeous scenery nice music i reall enjoyed playing it
this game is fantastic the graphics are beautiful the puzzles are clear and not too difficult to solve and the story is so good the story wasnt what i expected but i loved it
blob blob
loved it great story great voice acting beautiful art engaging puzzles really didnt want for anything more
a beautifully designed game with an unexpectedly heartfelt story puzzles were easymedium difficulty and the mystery of the island was well written only downside was nora runs so slowly
very enjoyable story great voice acting ran great
loved the puzzles the story the scenery the lore 1010 one of the best games ive played

the game is really great  visually super pleasant a real treat for the eyes most of the puzzles are easy but a couple actually made me stop and think which i enjoyed the story is engaging and its fun to see how things unfold running back and forth got a bit tiring at times especially since the character isnt exactly fast but overall i had a very positive experience
i loved it

this is an enjoyable adventure game  nothing to write home about but i enjoyed my time with it as a busy dad i always appreciate a game i can have fun with and finish in a few days  if you have access to vr i would play that version instead i think this would really benefit from the added immersion
amazing graphics the story is great too however the puzzles are a bit difficult and complex to understand overall the game is really good

a beautifully produced puzzle game that has a rather surprising twist in the story that actually ended up fairly heartwarming despite the eerie atmosphere throughout the game it really felt like you were uncovering a mystery as you explored the massive mystical environments and the voice acting really helped to sell it
i really like the style of this game the puzzles were good story was interesting visuals were pleasant all in all a very nice short puzzle based story game

this is a beautiful narrativedriven love story filled with fun puzzles it is more of a slowburn visual novel so the gameplay is minimal and can be clunky at times the visuals are stunning  you will see lush forests deep oceans ruins of the old world and otherworldly landscapes the story can however feel a little contrived and is predictable for those familiar with the genre i would recommend this to anyone who enjoys solving puzzles and is interested in lovecraftian mythos
no hint system and alttabbing is kinda buggy also hella slow and characters are wooden
a wonderful entry to the point and click adventure games i love

this game sometimes felt more like a chore than anything else because the running speed is so slow same for climbing ladders the puzzles were not not very difficult for the most part and were pretty straight forward also i didnt really enjoy the story all that much it started good but ended up being kinda weird i felt like  on the positive side the game is very beautiful
im too retded for this game
fun game with an intriguing story challenging but rewarding puzzles and a bittersweet conclusion

fantastic game superb artistic design great soundtrack and good story puzzle are complicated sometimes but very satisfactory when you resolve it is a great game in general terms special mention for spanish language supportsubtitles
great puzzle game great story

what a beautiful game a couple of puzzles were a bit too hard especially since i missed some pieces in my journal however the atmosphere voice acting and story were outstanding   i played it on a steam deck and it ran completely fine

bought this for 5 dollars on a steam sale for that much its definitely worth it id be a little mad if i paid a full 20 for it though cool premise with a very predictable story about half the puzzles are actual puzzles and the other half are just repeating the same steps over again until you do the thing which always left me wanting more also way too many sections that are just walking and looking at the admittedly nice scenery
entirely enthralling from start to finish was not expecting it to hit me so emotionally either great short game
the references to lovecrafts novels are extremely satisfying
excellent atmosphere voice acting and story smart but not too difficult puzzles that were fun to discover this is a great game for a few hours of mysterious and puzzling fun
couple goals

great narrative adventure with some good puzzles that are not overly complicated but not too simplistic it really can produce chilling atmosphere even though you are the only living person in the world you will experience the story of previous expedition through their notes call of the sea is often on discount which makes this short game worth picking up for a few bucks
i had fun with this for a few days playing a chapter a night  good puzzles and stories just buy it on sale as the full price is rather steep for what is on offer here
great game
an intriguing puzzle game with a unique story puzzles are in varying difficulty but for the most part are relatively straightforward
really beautiful graphics and engaging puzzles some are quite difficult the game is short but a lot of fun

some of the puzzles in this game can be a bit frustrating at times since there are no hints if youre not sure what to do though generally theyre not that difficult once you know the method to solve them aside from that this is a very good looking game with a decent story would recommend
beautiful game with an unexpected story it tells a beautiful bittersweet story
a really fun adventure puzzle game with a different look at the deep ones
good
great game beautiful graphics and a fantastic story

a lovely puzzle game with an intriguing story it was nice to have puzzles that required some exploration of the area and context to solve it was a nice level of difficultly that felt challenging whilst still being achievable would recommend 1010
shallow story bad voice acting too easy puzzles unrealistic details tape player in 1934  on a pro side very beautiful sea life underwater

a very good storyline with great graphics of the island ship caves undersea etc  for the most part the puzzles were intuitive but there are a few that made no sense to me at all the mural puzzle for instance and i would still be marooned there but for online walkthroughs  also the dimness underwater and in the caves impeded visibility to the point of groping around in the dark overall though this was well worth doing
beautiful visuals nice puzzles and the right amount of storyline really enjoyed this
1010 i am a sobbing mess

sad but beautiful  all achievements 78h  amazing art style great atmosphere great story fun puzzles gameplay can be a bit slow climbing ladders swimming and certain interactions felt super slow  glad i got to experience it

pros stunning graphics and art style cool puzzles good story pacing soundtrack is chill overall beautiful atmosphere   cons very slow walking and running speeds not a single characters shows up on game just pictures they didnt bother to model a single character sometimes she talks to much and helps way to soon with the puzzles would like to have figured out somethings without her hinting at me immediately   its a 710 if you like puzzles and find it on sale you should buy it

ah very very very beautiful game   the story is pretty fine  the monologues are really boring shes just saying what she sees   and holy molly all the running i was playing on steam deck and i was considering checking some puzzeles online only due to the location size  the ending is amazing i didnt expected that and really like that this was done

i bought the game only because i found an unofficial arabic translation on an external site i was hesitant at first but the translation really helped me enjoy and understand the story i hope the developers consider adding official arabic support in the future great game for fans of puzzles and mysterydriven narratives
beautiful visuals and a compelling story

i adored this game the puzzles were built well balanced in difficulty and every piece of information you might have needed to memorize was built in to a notebook in game the story was so moving and powerful and i found the game to be a work of pure art i highly recommend to anyone who is even slightly on the fence beautiful graphics and an amazing soundtrack i highly rate call of the sea
nice puzzles very good story and well made environment
this game is the perfect amount of spooky and mystery the story is compelling and the visuals are stunning i wish i could play it again for the first time

this game is beautiful from start to finish it felt like coming home it is now the standard to which i will hold all puzzle games i was never bored nothing was repetitive i couldnt wait to get back into the world and finish the story utterly beautiful

fun and unique story beautiful visuals and good voice acting some of the puzzles take big wrinkly brains though

i highly recommend this game the story is engaging the puzzles are challenging and most of all the environmental design is absolutely breathtaking i found myself slowly wandering around each level just enjoying the view i am a huge fan of the lovecraftian elements and it reminded me of the animated atlantis movie in some respects absolutely worth a playthrough

this is one of the best games that i have played ever if not the best it is similar to be in a virtal scape room each level very complex puzzles amazing story do not look anwers in internet it will ruin several hours of deep thinking enjoy

very pretty game had a good bit of fun wandering through puzzles are sometimes a little frustrating in needing to interact with places to fill out your notebook but the scenery blunts any complaints i could have from having to backtrack the ending epilogues show they had thought put into them beautifully bittersweet a short game nice if you want to sit down and get through something in one or two sessions

an incredible story beautiful graphics great storytelling and an incredible soundtrack this is truly is like a novel but in game form
its good

finally got around to playing call of the sea inspired by the launch of the tabletop version it is of course a brilliant adventure game with a lovely cartoony 3d art style great but not too challenging puzzles and some truly impressive characterization i really enjoyed the story which i would see as an almost reverselovecraftian story of the mythos a touch of horror of alienation wrapped about a core of joy
oh my lanta i never thought a puzzle game would be this exciting to play and watch as the story unfold i also love the two choices at the end 1010 game and needs to be talked about more

im not sure whether it takes a certain kind of brilliance or a specific type of brain damage to solve the puzzles in this game  maybe im just not smart enough for it which is entirely possible either way i didnt enjoy it the story had the potential to be interesting but when the gameplay relies on puzzles that feel impossible to get through without reading a guide sorry but thats a no from me
beautiful graphics and scenes cute storyline

at first glance looks interesting but then turns into a slog puzzles not very interesting walking around is slow game runs poorly on a steam deck after chapter 34 i only wanted to finish the game and be done with it  tbh nancy drew are much better puzzle games

i loved this game some might find it slow but to those who want to just enjoy a puzzle story game without any stress this is the game its not long but it didnt feel rushed or drawn out very good pacing

great puzzle game fantastic story i need more games like this
supercalifragilisticexpialidocious  i didnt expect to find such a great hidden gem

atmospheric with a great story much like american arcadia uniquely enjoyable

must play game has a fascinating story and great soundtracks that eventually makes the game perfect

great narrative walkingsimpuzzler with high production values throughout bought it because i enjoyed american arcadia and wasnt disappointed i thought the puzzles were pretty well paced but you definitely need to take your time stay observant and note the hints youre given

excellent adventure game very immersive and mysterious
